result.title: Regional review on Policy-Management in Mariculture and Freshwater Aquaculture
result.description: This includes sections on Aquaculture-Environment, Aquaculture-Other issues, i.e. it is an output of Tasks 2.1, 2.2, 2.3, and 2.4. Initial assessment at the kick-off meeting suggested that many of the issues that affect the marine environment and freshwater terrestrial environment were similar, which suggested that a single report would be more useful and more impactful than 2 reports. Delivery of the single report constituted completion of original deliverables 2.1 and 2.2.
